Title: 15 Minutes With
Tagline: An encounter with the press officer at ASAP Communication, Paris.
ChatText: We had coffee & spent time with Virna
IntroText: Virna, 27 years old, hails from the South of France born to an Italian father and Spanish mother. She made the move to Paris over 7 years ago with high energy with a sharp curiosity of life. Beware - she'll tell it like it is.

LeftQuestion.question: Your morning ritual?
LeftQuestion.answer: Getting ready even faster than the day before: I use up every single minute, waking up is absolute torture so I try to push back this moment to last possible minute.

LeftQuestion.question: Life in Paris/in France, its…
LeftQuestion.answer: It’s like reality TV. Every day is like a new episode with lots of action. I work in a press agency where we manage several brands, each day brings its own little bag of surprises: event, photoshoot, interview, fair, press presentation, agency life… when I get home at night, my boyfriend has to listen to my stories for hours and all the gossip that comes with it: “Live my life of a PR coordinator”

LeftQuestion.question: Morning or Evening?
LeftQuestion.answer: Seeing how tough it is for me to wake up, you will understand that I am more of an evening person. I like the freedom that the night brings, what is usually forbidden isn’t so much so anymore, there's something sexy in all that.

RightQuestion.question: The coolest person for you is…
RightQuestion.answer: My friends. They are all the coolest, so we come as one. And omg, what a team! If I could introduce them to you… you would all agree. We are actually thinking about making a movie out of our daily lives. It'd make a great story, with lots of laughs, surprises and also passion. We want to set this tale in history, and we want to see that for once - the beautiful story projected on the movie screens: it’s ours.

RightQuestion.question: My favourite Rosefield watch:
RightQuestion.answer: I love them all! On point, minimalist, fashion forward. They really look super cool. For now, I wear the bowery in blue rose gold - and people stop me a lot on the streets to ask me what brand my watch is. I swear!

RightQuestion.question: An hour free during the day, I…
RightQuestion.answer: Eat! In Paris, new restaurants spawn every week. I had a to-do list with all the places I want to try out. Everything is always a concept, and I like to have my own opinion for each restaurant - so anytime I can, I try :)

QuoteText: It’s like reality TV. Every day is like a new episode with lots of action.
Name: Virna

LeftQuestion.question: A nice memory?
LeftQuestion.answer: Uncontrollable laughter with my grandma, my mother and my sister. The coming together of four generations and all in Spanish. Each family event is a grand occasion - all very memorable. Nothing is ever normal with us.

LeftQuestion.question: I'm always on time/late?
LeftQuestion.answer: … late, as much as I try not to be. I try, Im working on it, it annoys the ones who hang out with me but I think I just have a very bad notion of the passing of time. I also have a terrible notion of distances actually.

LeftQuestion.question: If you could teleport - you would go…
LeftQuestion.answer: To the Golfe of Sperone : a beach coming right down from heaven in Corsica, competing with the most beautiful islands of this world. Forget about the Maldives and its 11hours flight to get there - it’s not worth it!

LeftQuestion.question: What people dont know about you?
LeftQuestion.answer: That I want to participate in the “Rallye des Gazelles” for my 30th birthday

RightQuestion.question: In 5 years, I will..
RightQuestion.answer: live in the south of france, in a cool house with a huge studio and a garden with lots of animals: 2 turtles, 3 cats, a funny dog and some chickens. I will also have a quad, a motorbike and an old convertible like a Golf 1 or a Lada.

RightQuestion.question: Your favorite saying?
RightQuestion.answer: “It’s Blue cheese who says to Camembert: you stink!” (hahaha). Another way of saying: people in glass houses shouldn’t throw stone. Super old school…

RightQuestion.question: You would love to spend an hour with…
RightQuestion.answer: Tom Hardy :) even if you can imagine that I am not his type - but I would like to know for sure. But I dont speak english really well, so I’m not sure I’ll be able to understand him.

RightQuestion.question: The song that you have on repeat?

WatchSection.WatchText: I love them all but my all time favorite is the bowery blue rosegold.

LeftQuestion.question: The last movie that made you cry?
LeftQuestion.answer: Mommy, from Dolan. But I also cried watching Zootopia or Stranger Things. Movies have a very powerful effect on me.

LeftQuestion.question: Your little habit?
LeftQuestion.answer: Chill at my house, wearing an old oversized t-shirt and granny panties: my passion!

RightQuestion.question: Your go-to 15 minute recipe?
RightQuestion.answer: The Poulette Sauce: whole cream, white wine, one vegetable stock cube and pepper. You pour this over pasta, chicken, mashed potatoes, mashed carrots… it’s fabulous!

MainCloseImageText.QuoteText: A good memory? The times when my grand-mother, mother, sister and i would burst into laughter.
